text: Nɨbu 18.9 Jer 50.46, Ese 27.30-35, CHL 17.2, 18.3, 18.18, 19.3 18.9-10 Ese 26.16-17 hɨbɨ pɨlɨ hɨsɨŋ iamɨgali me hɨnidaci manɨgali fɨli tɨbɨ mu mu migɨlavɨlalɨ agɨlaŋ akuaba akuaba mavɨn iga iga vivi nɨbu hula lusɨŋ sɨbɨlɨ sɨbɨlɨ mu hɨdɨlɨ mu hɨdɨlɨ agɨladɨ vihavalɨ aba abi uami. Manɨgali agɨlaŋ ala haiabɨla agaŋ avɨŋ lɨhulɨhu avɨmɨsɨ iahɨdaci iga iga mavɨn mɨŋamɨŋa ilɨhavɨbali aba abi uami.
